description: This is a Dart source file defining a Flutter widget for creating and editing notes in a notes app. It manages form state, loads existing note data when editing, and handles saving notes via provider and repository patterns.

classes.name: NoteEditorScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget for editing or creating notes.

methods.description: Updates form controllers with pending loaded data.
